item.description: About Me I am a PhD student at the department of computer science at Aarhus University. My supervisor is Bas Spitters. Research Interest Publications 2021 Formal security analysis of MPC-in-the-head-based Zero-Knowledge (CSF2021) [eprint] Nikolaj Sidorenco, Sabine Oescher, and Bas Spitters Presentations 2021, June CSF2021 [video] 2021, June Aarhus University LogSem Seminar 2021, May ZKProof Workshop 4 [video]
Email: sidorenco (at) cs · au · dk — Social Github
